scripts.dev: yarn clean:all && yarn install && cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn nodemon:go
scripts.build: yarn lint:js && yarn clean:all && yarn build:app
scripts.build:app: cross-env NODE_ENV=production environment=build yarn --cwd src/app next build
scripts.build:debug: yarn clean:all && yarn install --check-files && cross-env x_app_debug=true yarn build:job
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production environment=test yarn node:go:debug -p 4000 src/app
scripts.clean:all: yarn clean:babel_cache && yarn clean:npm_cache && yarn clean:next_cache
